title: This Is Us’ Justin Hartley Kisses Wife Sofia Pernas on Golden Globes 2024 Red Carpet | 2024 Golden Globes, Golden Globes, Justin Hartley, Sofia Pernas | Just Jared: Celebrity News and Gossip | Entertainment
text: This Is Us' Justin Hartley Kisses Wife Sofia Pernas on Golden Globes 2024 Red Carpet [Justin Hartley](https://www.justjared.com/tags/justin-hartley/) is one of the first stars to arrive at the [2024 Golden Globe Awards](https://www.justjared.com/tags/2024-golden-globes/)! The 46-year-old former This Is Us actor is joined by wife [Sofia Pernas](https://www.justjared.com/tags/sofia-pernas/) on the red carpet for the event held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Sunday (January 7) in Beverly Hills, Calif. Justin is one of the presenters at the show tonight and he’s there to promote his new CBS series Tracker, which will premiere on February 11 after the Super Bowl. The Golden Globes will air on CBS this year, marking a change in network after many years on NBC. The show is being hosted by comedian [Jo Koy](https://www.justjared.com/tags/jo-koy/). Make sure to [check out the full list of nominations](https://www.justjared.com/2023/12/11/golden-globes-2024-nominations-full-list-of-nominees-released/)! FYI: Sofia is wearing a Pamella Roland dress. Browse through the gallery for 10+ photos of Justin Hartley and Sofia Pernas on the carpet… [2024 Golden Globes](https://www.justjared.com/tags/2024-golden-globes/), [Golden Globes](https://www.justjared.com/tags/golden-globes/), [Justin Hartley](https://www.justjared.com/tags/justin-hartley/), [Sofia Pernas](https://www.justjared.com/tags/sofia-pernas/)
